apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a loving kiss from a man with a dark skin tone, rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and soft, rounded edges. The gentle blush on his cheeks and the subtle puckering of his lips convey warmth and affection, all while maintaining a smooth, three-dimensional appearance. This emoji is perfect for expressing romantic feelings or sending a tender kiss in messages, showcasing Apple's commitment to inclusive representation and detailed design.
